ygData.subject: Re: Armor and Dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: the best dual wield combo right now till you get bloodclaw is(for warriors) Tomahawk axe and Ashenwooden Spear( 6dm 22delay effect haste ). I use both of them
ygData.messageBody:
the best dual wield combo right now till you get bloodclaw is(for
warriors) Tomahawk axe and Ashenwooden Spear( 6dm 22delay effect haste
). I use both of them and i non-stop attack.

John Cynkar wrote:

> First of all, to answer the question of a full suit of bronze. A
> small suit can cost from 300p to 350p. Also, I bought a Symbol of
> loyalty to Vox Bracer for 20p! I found out that is twice as good as a
> Steel Plate one. Nonetheless, I am selling it because in a while it
> will probally be common. People have offered 400p and more for it!
> Talk about profit. I have just gotten dual wield, what should I use,
> I am thinking of buying two combine LS's, to replace my Dwarven 2H
> axe. Should I? Also, could two Tentacle whips be better than two
> combine LS's? Well, Can anyone tell me what 1H slashing weapons I
> should get, I have about 400p now. ) Dubas,Mithaniel Marr.
